title: Horrifying moment off-duty cop is murdered while trying to stop a supermarket robbery in Argentina
text:
A heroic off-duty police officer has been shot dead while attempting to stop a robbery in Argentina on Sunday.

Officer Lucas Giménez was shopping for groceries at a supermarket in San Miguel, a town in the province of Buenos Aires, when two armed men entered the store Sunday.

CCTV video of the horrific incident captured the moment the 35-year-old was completing his purchase before he jumped into action.

One of the suspects who first entered the Chinese-product supermarket wrestled with the fallen police officer for control of the gun.

Officer Lucas Giménez was shot dead at a supermarket in Argentina on Sunday when tried to stop a robbery

Gunman fires his weapon at police officer Lucas Giménez after the pair wrestled for control of the robber's gun

Surveillance footage showed a male customer and child walking towards the back of the store while a third shopper ran out through the front door entrance.

After a brief struggle, Giménez was subsequently shot and fell to the ground as the suspect reached for the cop's pockets.

The gunman then fired a second shot when his accomplice stepped inside the supermarket. He reached over the counter register before they fled the scene with an unknown amount of money.

Paramedics transported Giménez to a local hospital where he was pronounced dead as a result of the injuries suffered from his leg and abdomen gun shot wounds.

Argentine authorities said the suspects remained at-large.
description: Police officer Lucas Giménez was gunned down inside a supermarket in Argentina when he jumped into action and attempted to stop a robbery on Sunday.
